page.title: 04Macc. Forest - Recreation
page.content:
RECREATION
The majority of ladies belong to the Women's Institute held in the nearby village of Wildboarclough. Most young people are members of the Macclesfield Young Farmers Club and some enjoy banger racing at nearby High Edge Raceway, Buxton.
There is hang gliding from Shining Tor which is the highest point in Cheshire and during the Winter tobogganing and skiing provide thrills on the snow covered slopes.
Lamaload Reservoir provides private fly fishing facilities for the local angling club. The reservoir is restocked monthly with rainbow trout. There are also brown trout which breed naturally.
